title: Law governing the City of Kigali
title_en: Law governing the City of Kigali

provisions.title: Article 48 - Taking oath for members of
provisions.content: the Council and members of the Executive Committee of the City of Kigali Members of the Council and members of the Executive Committee of the City of Kigali take oath before the competent court. The time and modalities for taking oath are determined by an Order of the Minister in charge of local government.

provisions.title: Article 49 - Responsibilities of Districts of
provisions.content: the City of Kigali by virtue of specific laws Responsibilities of Districts of the City of Kigali provided for by specific laws are performed by the City of Kigali pending amendment of the said laws to conform to the provisions of this law.

provisions.title: Article 50 - Validity of acts performed by
provisions.content: Districts of the City of Kigali Acts performed by Districts of the City of Kigali in accordance with Law n° 87/2013 of 11/09/2013 determining the organisation and functioning of decentralized administrative entities and such other specific laws remain valid.

provisions.title: Article 51 - Contracts, assets and
provisions.content: liabilities of Districts of the City of Kigali Contracts, moveable and immovable assets and liabilities formerly owned by Districts of the City of Kigali in accordance with Law n° 87/2013 of 11/09/2013 determining the organisation and functioning of decentralized administrative entities are transferred to the City of Kigali as governed by this Law.

provisions.title: Article 52 - Legal actions formerly
provisions.content: involving Districts of the City of Kigali Legal actions formerly filed by or against Districts of the City of Kigali, cases that Districts of the City of Kigali won or lost are dealt with by the City of Kigali.

provisions.title: Article 53 - Personnel of Districts of the
provisions.content: City of Kigali and personnel of the City of Kigali Personnel formerly employed by Districts of the City of Kigali and the City of Kigali under Law n° 87/2013 of 11/09/2013 determining the organisation and functioning of decentralized administrative entities are transferred to the City of Kigali as governed by this law and they are deployed according to relevant laws.

provisions.title: Article 54 - Drafting, consideration and
provisions.content: adoption of this Law This Law was drafted, considered and adopted in Ikinyarwanda.

provisions.title: Article 55 - Non-application of legal
provisions.content: provisions and repealing provision Provisions of Law n° 87/2013 of 11/09/2013 determining the organisation and functioning of decentralized administrative entities do not apply to the City of Kigali. All other prior legal provisions contrary to this Law are repealed.

provisions.title: Article 56 - Commencement
provisions.content: This Law comes into force on the date of its publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda. provisions.title: Article 2 - Authorities responsible for the
provisions.content: implementation of this Order The Prime Minister, the Minister of Finance and Economic Planning, the Minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation and the Minister of Agriculture and Animal Resources are entrusted with the implementation of this Order.

provisions.title: Article 1 - Ratification
provisions.content: The Grant Agreement, signed at Kigali, Rwanda on 16 May 2019, between the Republic of Rwanda and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development/International Development Association acting as administrator of the transformation of agriculture sector Program 4 Program-for- Results Phase 2 Multi-Donor Trust Fund, relating to the grant of seventeen million American Dollars (USD 17,000,000) for transformation of agriculture sector Program 4 phase 2, annexed to this Order is ratified and becomes fully effective.
